text.div:
VhDir Insurance Plan Cost Category

This value set defines a set of codes that indicate the cost catagory of a plan.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/insuranceplan
    CodeDisplay
    medicalMedicalNedical
    dentalDentalDental
    visionVisionVision
    drugDrugDrug
    mentalhealthMental healthMental health
    substanceabuseSubstance abuseSubstance abuse
    hospicehomehealthHospice and home healthHospice and home health

name: VhDirInsPlanCostCategory
title: VhDir Insurance Plan Cost Category
description: This value set defines a set of codes that indicate the cost catagory of a plan.
